products.title: Our Air Conditioning System Range
products.subtitle: At DAMI AIR PTY LTD, we offer a range of modern air conditioning systems designed to suit different property types, energy needs, and budgets. Whether you're upgrading an old heater, building a new home, or working on a commercial project, we can help you choose the right system — and where eligible, help you access rebates through the Victorian Energy Upgrades (VEU) program.

vrv.title: VRF / VRV / Multi-Head Systems
vrv.subtitle: (VEU-Eligible)
vrv.bestFor: Homes or units with multiple rooms to cool, where ductwork isn't practical
vrv.description: Connect several indoor units to a single outdoor compressor to individually control temperatures in each room. Great for existing homes, renovations, double storey homes or properties with limited roof space.
vrv.bonus: These systems are eligible for VEU rebates, making them a smart investment for energy-conscious homeowners.

ducted.title: Ducted Air Conditioning Systems
ducted.bestFor: Whole-home comfort in new builds or major renovations
ducted.description: Discreet, powerful cooling and heating delivered through ceiling or floor ducts. Perfect for homeowners wanting seamless climate control throughout the entire property with minimal visual impact.

evaporative.title: Evaporative Cooling Systems
evaporative.description: A cost-effective, eco-friendly solution that uses water to cool air naturally. Ideal for families looking for fresh airflow and low running costs in Victoria's drier seasons.

cta.title: Not Sure Which System is Right for You?
cta.description: Our licensed specialists will assess your layout, lifestyle, and energy goals to recommend the ideal system — and help you take advantage of any available VEU rebates to reduce your installation cost.

about.title: About DAMI AIR
about.description: At DAMI AIR PTY LTD, we specialise in air conditioning installation, repair, and maintenance for residential and commercial properties across Melbourne. With a skilled team of fully licensed refrigerant handlers, plumbers, and electricians, we deliver safe, efficient, and compliant solutions tailored to your needs. From new builds and renovations to energy-saving upgrades through the Victorian Energy Upgrades (VEU) program, we're committed to quality workmanship and reliable service at competitive prices.

team.title: Meet Our Expert Team
team.intro: At DAMI AIR PTY LTD, our strength lies in our people. We're a team of fully qualified and licensed refrigerant handlers, plumbers, and electricians, committed to delivering safe, compliant, and high-quality air conditioning solutions across Melbourne.
team.experience: From new installations to complex energy upgrades and HVAC servicing, our technicians bring years of hands-on experience, technical knowledge, and attention to detail to every project.

capabilities.title: Our Team Capabilities
items: Licensed in accordance with Australian regulations
Experienced across residential, renovation, and new build projects
Dedicated to safety, efficiency, and customer satisfaction
Regularly trained to stay up-to-date with the latest industry standards and energy efficiency practices

licenses.title: Licensed & Accredited
licenses.intro: We are proudly registered with the following industry bodies:

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.pricingDescription: We provide clear, upfront pricing with no hidden costs. Get detailed quotes that break down all costs before any work begins.
whyChooseUs.techniciansDescription: Our team consists of fully licensed and certified technicians with extensive experience in HVAC systems.
whyChooseUs.brandsDescription: We partner with leading manufacturers to offer you the highest quality equipment and parts available.
whyChooseUs.supportDescription: 24/7 customer support and rapid response times for all your HVAC needs. We're always here when you need us.

cta.title: Need Professional HVAC Service?
cta.subtitle: Get in touch with us today for a free consultation and quote.

footer.companyDescription: DAMI has over 10 years experience helping Melbourne locals with their plumbing, heating and cooling needs. Top quality products, professional installation and world class customer service.

brands.description: At DAMI AIR PTY LTD, we supply and install all major brands, allowing us to offer customised options that balance comfort, design, budget and long-term performance.
